divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were coming home from shopping, it was dark outside, we live out in the country. we were about 2 to 3 miles from home, when out of no where , 3 lights appeared in the sky. they were orange and yellow color in a row, they flashed a couple times then 2 more lights went in front of them. they were flashing back and forth to one another. then the lights went out one at a time. then there was 3 small blinking lights in a distrance just hoving. this isn't the first time we've seen sightings where we live at. but this is the first time at nite. over the summer of this year 2012 we seen 2 ufos a mile from our home. and they were both landing in distance. another time the year 2010 my husband and i were going out hunting in the afternoon. when out of no where there was a cigar shaped ufo hoving over the trees, we were 1\2 mile away from it. and it was going south, zigzaging. something is going on here in the thumb area of michigan.the stinky part is i didn't get any pics. but one day i will.
Summary: orange and yellow lights in the sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Decker
This sighting has never been favorited.
